attributes.action: No More Money to the EU
attributes.additional_details: After another Bomb shell from our leaders in the EU demanding yet more money from the Tax payers of this country, its now time the people demanded of their so called MPs to tell Cameron to tell the Brussels Mafia to go take a hike. The People of this country are hurting really hurting. Its now time for all the Westminster lot to start earning the wages we pay them.
